item.content:encoded:
Hey Dan,

This is brilliant! Keep up the good work. I’m a former journalist driven nuts by the news consuming public’s unwillingness/inability to question the veracity of their sources. Anything that makes fact checking easier is great. Now if we can only introduce more folks to the idea of what a “fact” is …
